input.sentences: my sister looking deep in thought on chrismas night .
her husband almost knocked over my tv by resting his arm on it .
my hubby savoring his tasty drink .
[male] somehow found a eye patch and decided to be a pirate all night .
output.sentences: My sister, last night was deep in thought.
Her boyfriend was leaning on the tv resting his arm and almost knocked it over.
He had a tasty drink savoring it all was my sister's husband.
Everyone called my uncle a pirate because he had a patch on that night.
Most of the family watched the game of football enjoying seeing our favorite team.
